price: Nyinyi mna dini yenu, nami nina Dini yangu.
footnotes: Nyinyi mna dini yenu mnayo itakidi, na mimi nina Dini yangu aliyo niteulia Mwenyezi Mungu niishike.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
